recommendations: Anindyadeep Sannigrahi “Ansh is one of those versatile people I have met in my life. A great, fast learner, a humble person, a good friend, and a great team player. There are very few people I have known, who keep immense potential in keeping strong foundations in every domain. At the same time, he also possesses a great taste in non-technical and cultural domains. He possesses a great entrepreneurial spirit that inspires me to think out of the box. Any organization would be lucky to onboard him as a potential valuable team player.”
